Dialogue.Page: Hi! I'm GameWyrm! I'm primarily known for my work on Hearth's Neighbor, and its sequel, Magistarium!
I'm also involved in the Archipelago Randomizer implementation for Outer Wilds! I also created Outer Relics, and worked with xen on a puzzle mod called "Escape Room"!
I'm also working on a new mod called Halcyon Nexus Zero, so keep a look out for that!
Anyway, glad to see you here in the community mod jam! If you went here as one of the first places you visited, well, good choice! I bet we'll see each other again soon...
